title: We can have a full pokemon team! (SOON)
body:
Annie's Tibbers
Ivern's Daisy
Yorick's Maiden of the Mist
Mordekaiser's Dragon
Random player's Rift Herald


*Plays Pokémon theme*

replies.body:
Quinn and Valor

Happy?
Yes!
Zyra plants?

We need a video with a gym leader of every type taken from LoL.

{{champion:143}} Grass
{{champion:63}} Fire
{{champion:267}} Water
{{champion:53}} Electric
{{champion:60}} Bug (suggestion by Command Ethereal)
{{champion:133}} Flying
{{champion:27}} Poison
{{champion:163}}  Rock (suggestion by Command Ethereal)
{{champion:33}} Ground
{{champion:86}} Normal
{{champion:64}} Fighting (suggestion by Yougotkilledbro)
{{champion:429}} Ghost
{{champion:134}} Psycho
{{champion:113}} Ice
{{champion:102}} Dragon
{{champion:56}} Dark
{{champion:117}} Fairy
{{champion:164}} Steel (I know people will ask for Mordekaiser instead)
Scratch Nocturne, dark type doesn't get a gym. Still don't understand that.

Because dark type is evil. :O
Would be cool to have a gym controlled by a dark type pokemon instead of the trainer.

Imagine abusive relationship. You have a cowardly trainer with a dark type pokemon and if the trainer doesn't do what the pokemon wants to, he gets a sucker punch.
I'll just sit over here with my Absol, Zoroark and Umbreon that I love dearly then....

Oh I know dark types are great.
I am grass type only trainer, but Shiftry and Cacturne belong to my all time favourites.

I am sure they will give us a dark type gym in the future, just have to wait for it a bit longer. :P
Hmm, I think Elise fits better as Bug? Also, Taliyah would be so good for Rock.

Right, we need more sexy gym leader ala Elesa.
Will change it. :3

blitz is more of a steel electric.

instead you should have used the pikachu of league {{champion:85}}

That's another possible combination.

I just want a great anime artist to do this, god dammit. ;__:

Ye forgot Steel type mate.

For steel I'd suggest Viktor, Galio, or having Kennen take Blitzcrank's place.

Why Galio?  He's not made entirely out of stone, just look at the wings and gold plating, and having a major defensive ability is inline with the defensive nature of steel types.

Noticed it myself and added it just 1 minute before you posted this. ^^
My decision was Camille though.

Several reasons for that.
Camilles title is the steel shadow. Parts of her body are made out of steel (just like Viktor, I know). Her Grappling Hook would make an awesome entrance in the arena to fight the trainer.

And Camille having Pawniard as her signature pokemon is just way too good of an opportunity.
Only change I would make would be {{champion:64}} for fighting

Unlike Lee Sin, I saw that coming.

My aversion against him probably blinded me in my decision.
And Udyr fits the martial artist archetype for me as well.
But if the people demand the sightless monk, so be it!
Fun fact: As of yet, there are no dark type gym leaders in any main series pokemon games.
Thanks for pointing that out, didn't notice this until now. Well, it's time we get one finally.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ioTa33X,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-04-16T11:36:12.259+0000)
>
> We need a video with a gym leader of every type taken from LoL.
> 
>
> {{champion:53}} Electric

kennen should be electric, or voli, the lightning for blitz is really more of a side effect, any other champ with electricity would be better (who else is electric themed?)

I wouldn't call Blitzcranks static field (the active effect of his ultimate) just a side effect though.
And he would make a way better entrance in the arena in my opinion. :P
{{champion:43}}  Wind (maybe???)

There is no wind type, just flying. :O
And don't you think Quinn fits that better?

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3ioTa33X,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-04-16T11:36:12.259+0000)

This.
I just want her to stop hitting me with her balls.....
*psychic?
No, she is clearly a psycho.

I believe this is the pokemon music you wanted...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JNJJ-QkZ8cM
perfect for yorick
NONONONONONO

have your random be skarner and you get all 6

skarner IS a pokemon afterall.

What about Malz? 
He has so many Pokemon! >_>
{{champion:34}} Wheres my god dam articuno skin riot
Shaco too? Or Malz? Or Heimer?

Yeah, soon we totally are going to get a full pokemon team!

Xayah's Rakan

{{champion:268}}'s soldiers
but they dont act on their own
Like Pokemon in the games.
what about the anime?
[Some of them don't act on their own in the anime either. ^^](https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSfv0qtoTi7zExaO_SP2k6phx7vTgmY-VH6-c6gwvOu1TLhHj8e)
But what if Morde gets the herald with his ult and then you have TWO heralds? :D

Syndra mid (cause she can have multiple pokemon thanks to w)

Plays Pokémon theme

LoLs equivalents of magikarp?
Kennen is Pikachu.
Oh good, going 5v9! (5v10, but Rift Herald don't attack no champions, so...)
